channel.title: My technical corner
channel.description: Recent content on My technical corner

item.description: hugo 搭建个人网站 for mac 本地搭建 安装hugo brew install hugo 创建网站 hugo new site myblog 给网站添加一个主题 shell cd myblog git init git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.toml 添加一些内容 hugo new posts/my-first-post.md 启动hugo server hugo server -D 启动成功后在http://localhost:1313/就可以看到自己的网站了 部署到github上 Create a <YOUR-PROJECT> (e.g. blog) repository on GitHub. This repository will contain Hugo’s content and other source files. Create a <USERNAME>.github.io GitHub repository.
